Package org.douggschwind.games.dicegames.boggle

Class Boggle4x4Dice

java.lang.Object
org.douggschwind.games.dicegames.boggle.BoggleDice
org.douggschwind.games.dicegames.boggle.Boggle4x4Dice
public class Boggle4x4Dice extends BoggleDice
This is the dice configuration for the English Boggle 16 dice version: Die0: R, I, F, O, B, X Die1: I, F, E, H, E, Y Die2: D, E, N, O, W, S Die3: U, T, O, K, N, D Die4: H, M, S, R, A, O Die5: L, U, P, E, T, S Die6: A, C, I, T, O, A Die7: Y, L, G, K, U, E Die8: Qu, B, M, J, O, A Die9: E, H, I, S, P, N Die10: V, E, T, I, G, N Die11: B, A, L, I, Y, T Die12: E, Z, A, V, N, D Die13: R, A, L, E, S, C Die14: U, W, I, L, R, G Die15: P, A, C, E, M, D

  • Method Details

    • size

      public final int size()
      Specified by:
      size in class BoggleDice
      Returns:
      The size of the supported game board, where size indicates the number of rows and the same number of columns on the game board.

    • getSupportedDice

      public final List<DieLetter>[] getSupportedDice()
      Specified by:
      getSupportedDice in class BoggleDice
      Returns:
      An array where within each element is a List of DieLetters representing all six possible letters that can appear on the die. This array in total represent all of the dice supported for a given game board configuration.
